title: Lightning Jabber
content:
b's claw and the charged imagination of kua-toa fishfolk.

BG3 Lightning Jabber Information

Shocking Sting : On a hit, possibly Shock your target. Throwing: Lightning Damage: When launched at a target, deal an additional 1-4 Lightning damage. Range: 1.5m

BG3 Lightning Jabber Location & Where to Find

Location: Kuo-Toa ambush northeast of the Grand Mausoleum area. Dropped by: Kuo-Toa chief.

Lightning Jabber Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 65 Weight: 1.35
